sentences.english: His breathing was shallow and his pulse was weak .
sentences.chinese: 他呼吸很浅，脉搏微弱。

sentences.english: She felt his neck. There was no pulse.
sentences.chinese: 她摸了摸他的颈部，没有脉搏。

sentences.english: Her pulse raced (= beat very quickly ) with excitement.
sentences.chinese: 她激动得脉搏急速跳动。

detailed_translations.english: the regular beat that can be felt, for example at your wrist, as your heart pumps blood around your body
to move or flow with a steady quickbeat or sound

sentences.english: Any illness of the lungs or throat , such as asthma or a cough.
sentences.chinese: 消耗病，痨病肺部或喉咙的任何一种病变，如哮喘或咳嗽。

sentences.english: It scares me sometimes because I do have asthma and when I walk, I do gasp for air.
sentences.chinese: 她说：“我会担心体重，因为我有哮喘，我走路的时候总是气喘吁吁。

sentences.english: Another aspect of this problem is control of asthma among children in these populations.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题的另一个方面是在这些群体的儿童中控制哮喘。

detailed_translations.english: a medical condition that causes difficulties in breathing

sentences.english: So, what of the future of obesity in America?
sentences.chinese: 那么，未来美国的肥胖状况会怎么发展呢？

sentences.english: Dr.Watson is great on exercise as a cure for obesity.
sentences.chinese: 沃森医生把运动看做是治疗肥胖症的良方。

sentences.english: What is obesity?
sentences.chinese: 什么是肥胖？

detailed_translations.english: when someone is very fat in a way that is unhealthy

sentences.english: I wonder if this letter is overweight.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道这封信是否超重。

sentences.english: If your luggage is overweight, you'll have to pay extra.
sentences.chinese: 假如你的行李过重了， 你得付额外的运费。

sentences.english: Why are so many of us overweight?
sentences.chinese: 为什么我们中的许多人会超重？

sentences.english: Mr. Thomas was suffering from depression.
sentences.chinese: 托马斯先生当时正受抑郁症折磨。

detailed_translations.chinese: 抑郁， 沮丧； 不景气， 萧条； 洼地， 凹陷
detailed_translations.english: the period during the 1930s when there was not much business activity and not many jobs

sentences.english: You have diabetes, or liver or kidney disease.
sentences.chinese: 有糖尿病，或者是有肝病或肾病者。

sentences.english: It is like diabetes or asthma, an illness, due to a build up of pressures, which can happen to anyone.
sentences.chinese: 就像是糖尿病或者哮喘，由于压力的形成，这种病有可能发生在任何人身上。

sentences.english: We can then translate this information into estimates of the current diabetes and cardiovascular disease that can be attributed to the rise in consumption of these drinks.
sentences.chinese: 然后我们可以将这些信息转变成对当前糖尿病和冠心病的估计，而这些疾病是软饮料消耗量的增加所导致的。

detailed_translations.english: a serious disease in which there is too much sugar in your blood

name: diabetic
trans: n. 糖尿病人；adj. 患糖尿病的

sentences.english: There have been great advances in the treatment of cancer.
sentences.chinese: 癌症治疗有了很大的进展。

sentences.english: Just lately, Kyra has been giving me the silent treatment (= refusing to speak to me because she is angry with me ) .
sentences.chinese: 就在最近，凯拉一直对我不理不睬。

detailed_translations.english: something that is done to cure someone who is injured or ill

sentences.english: The problems in our schools do not have a simple remedy.
sentences.chinese: 我们学校的问题没有简单的解决办法。

sentences.english: To remedy the situation, the water must be chemically treated.
sentences.chinese: 为了改善这种情况，水必须进行化学处理。

detailed_translations.english: a way of dealing with a problem or making a bad situation better
to deal with a problem or improve a bad situation

sentences.english: new drug therapies
sentences.chinese: 新的药物疗法

sentences.english: radiation therapy for cancer treatment
sentences.chinese: 治疗癌症的放射疗法

detailed_translations.english: the treatment of an illness or injury over a fairly long period of time

sentences.english: Alex massaged Helena’s aching back.
sentences.chinese: 亚历克斯给海伦娜疼痛的背部做了推拿。

detailed_translations.english: to press and rub someone’s body with your hands, to help them relax or to reduce pain in their muscles
the action of pressing and rubbing someone’s body with your hands, to help them relax or to reduce pain in their muscles or joints

sentences.english: The message of the film is that good always triumphs over evil.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影的主题思想是善良终必战胜邪恶。

sentences.english: The result of this legal battle sends an important message to people in similar situations.
sentences.chinese: 这场诉讼战的结果给情况相似的人们传递了一个重要的信息。

sentences.english: It’s perfectly possible to get your message across (= communicate what you want to say ) without being so angry.
sentences.chinese: 就算不这么生气，你也完全可以把意思说清楚。

sentences.english: They use illustrations to convey their message.
sentences.chinese: 他们用图示来表达他们的意思。

detailed_translations.english: the main or most important idea that someone is trying to tell people about in a film, book, speech etc

sentences.english: the four main acupuncture points
sentences.chinese: 四大穴位

detailed_translations.chinese: 针刺；[中医] 针刺疗法
detailed_translations.english: a treatment for pain and disease that involves pushing special needles into parts of the body

sentences.english: The whole tax system is now operating more efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 现在整个税收制度运作效率更高了。

sentences.english: The new law doesn’t operate in our favour.
sentences.chinese: 这项新法规对我们不利。

sentences.english: The car parks operate a pay-as-you-leave system.
sentences.chinese: 这些停车场按“离开时付费”的模式运作。

sentences.english: The bus company operates a Monday to Saturday service.
sentences.chinese: 这家公共汽车公司周一至周六运营。

detailed_translations.english: if a system, process, or service operates, or if you operate it, it works
to use and control a machine or equipment

sentences.english: Dogs must be vaccinated against distemper.
sentences.chinese: 犬类必须接种疫苗以防犬热病。

detailed_translations.english: to protect a person or animal from a disease by giving them a vaccine

sentences.english: The physician examines the patient then diagnoses the disease and prescribes medication.
sentences.chinese: 内科医生检查了病人，然后对疾病作出诊断，并开出药方。

sentences.english: What punishment does the law prescribe for this crime?
sentences.chinese: 法律规定这种罪行应受何处罚？

detailed_translations.english: to say what medicine or treatment a sick person should have

sentences.english: an all-night pharmacy
sentences.chinese: 通宵药店

detailed_translations.chinese: 药房；配药学，药剂学；制药业；一批备用药品
detailed_translations.english: a shop or a part of a shop where medicines are prepared and sold

sentences.english: She took a couple of headache tablets .
sentences.chinese: 她吃了几片头痛药。

detailed_translations.chinese: 碑；药片；写字板；小块；平板电脑
detailed_translations.english: a small round hard piece of medicine which you swallow

detailed_translations.chinese: 用碑牌纪念；将(备忘录等)写在板上；将…制成小片或小块

sentences.english: He has to take pills to control his blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 他必须服药控制血压。

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["sleeping pills"]}
sentences.chinese: 安眠药

sentences.english: a bottle of vitamin pills
sentences.chinese: 一瓶维生素片

detailed_translations.chinese: 药丸；弹丸，子弹；口服避孕药
detailed_translations.english: a small solid piece of medicine that you swallow whole

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…制成丸剂；使服用药丸；抢劫，掠夺（古语）

sentences.english: a space capsule orbiting the Earth
sentences.chinese: 沿地球轨道飞行的太空舱

detailed_translations.chinese: 胶囊； 航天舱， 密封舱
detailed_translations.english: a plastic container shaped like a very small tube with medicine inside that you swallow whole

sentences.english: "If you can stop the enzymes involved in that process with a small molecule or chemical," says Dunman, "that chemical could be an antibiotic.
sentences.chinese: “如果能用一小分子或化学物质阻止这一酶的活性过程，”德明说，“这种化学物质就能够用来做抗生素。”

sentences.english: If we all recognize that antibiotic resistance is one of the greatest threats to public health that we face today, we have to do something about this.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们大家都能认识到耐抗生素（药性）已经成为我们今天面对的最大的公众健康威胁之一，我们就真的需要做点什么了。

detailed_translations.english: a drug that is used to kill  bacteria  and cure infections

sentences.english: an overdose of painkillers
sentences.chinese: 过量止痛药

detailed_translations.english: a medicine which reduces or removes pain

sentences.english: The nurse dosed the patient with aspirin.
sentences.chinese: 护士给病人服阿司匹林。

sentences.english: The nurse dosed out aspirin to a patient.
sentences.chinese: 护士给病人服阿司匹林。

sentences.english: She dosed him with non-aspirin tablets to reduce the fever.
sentences.chinese: 她让他服用非阿司匹林药片降温退烧。

detailed_translations.english: a medicine that reduces pain,  inflammation  , and fever

sentences.english: I think we were fooled by penicillin.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我们都被青霉素愚弄了。

sentences.english: I should have asked him for a shot of penicillin.
sentences.chinese: 我应当让他给我打一针青霉素的。

sentences.english: Thatreally sped up the development of penicillin as an antibiotic.
sentences.chinese: 这确实加快了青霉素作为抗生素的发展。

detailed_translations.english: a type of medicine that is used to treat infections caused by  bacteria

sentences.english: Try to eat foods that are rich in vitamins and minerals.
sentences.chinese: 尽量吃富含维生素和矿物质的食物。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical substance in food that is necessary for good health

sentences.english: That had an interesting and extremely useful side effect.
sentences.chinese: 那有一个有趣和非常有用的负作用。

sentences.english: Yet another side effect is that I seem to think much better when I eat this way.
sentences.chinese: 而且，还有第三种作用，那就是我的思考能力通过这种饮食法大大提高了。

sentences.english: As a side effect of all this, you can use a stylesheet that doesn't do anything to a document, and simply take one format as input and output that document to any other format.
sentences.chinese: 这种方法的另外一个作用是，您可以使用一个不含任何文档操作的样式表，并使用某种格式作为输入，然后将这种格式输出为任意其他的格式。

detailed_translations.english: an effect that a drug has on your body in addition to curing pain or illness
